spell_tooltip.description: Surging Totem is 50% more effective and costs 60% less mana.
Heals the friendly target for 350,414, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 4 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Heals the friendly target for 350,265, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 4 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Heals the friendly target for 347,863, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 4 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 401,639 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 398,486 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 392,683 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 12 sec.
Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 279,617 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 3 total targets.

Protects the target with an earthen shield, increasing your healing on them by 20% and healing them for 116,253 when they take damage. This heal can only occur once every 3 sec. Lasts 1 hour.

Earth Shield can only be placed on the Shaman and one other target at a time. The Shaman can have up to two Elemental Shields active on them.
Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Astral Shift by 30 sec.
Ghost Wolf removes snares and increases your movement speed by an additional 25% for the first 3 sec. May only occur once every 20 sec.

Increases the number of Elemental Shields you can have active on yourself by 1.

You can have Earth Shield on yourself and one ally at the same time.
Summons a totem at the target location that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and explodes after 2 sec, stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 3 sec.
A gust of wind hurls you forward.
Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.

Calls forth a Greater Earth Elemental to protect you and your allies for 1 min.

While this elemental is active, your maximum health is increased by 15%.

Healing from Healing Stream Totem reduces Fire, Frost, and Nature damage taken by 6% for 3 sec.

Healing from Cloudburst Totem reduces Fire, Frost, and Nature damage taken by 3% for 3 sec.
Purify Spirit additionally removes all Curse effects.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
Summons a totem at the target location for 18 sec, continually granting all allies who pass within 13 yards 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec.
While you have an elemental active, your damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Calls upon the guidance of the spirits for 15 sec, permitting movement while casting Shaman spells. Castable while casting. Increases movement speed by 20%.

Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 15,604 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them away from the Shaman. Usable while stunned.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, Ancestral Protection, Earthen Wall, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
The effects of your weapon and shield imbues are increased by 20%.
Reduces the cooldown of Spiritwalker's Grace by 30 sec and increases your movement speed by 20% while it is active.
Relocates your active totems to the specified location.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.
Summons a totem at your feet that removes all Poison effects from a nearby party or raid member within 39 yards every 1.5 sec for 9 sec.
Resets the cooldown of your most recently used totem with a base cooldown shorter than 3 minutes.
Your next healing or damaging Nature spell is instant cast and costs no mana.
Summons a totem at your feet that grants you an absorb shield preventing 3.7 million damage for 15 sec, and an additional 370,746 every 5 sec for 30 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Totemic Recall by 60 sec.
Restorative waters wash over a friendly target, healing them for 376,244 and an additional 164,006 over 18 sec.
Blanket the target area in healing rains, restoring 403,932 health to up to 5 allies over 10 sec.
Healing Wave, Healing Surge, and Chain Heal heal for an additional 15% on targets affected by your Healing Rain or Riptide.
Deal 90,686 Nature damage every 1 sec to up to 5 enemies inside of your Healing Rain.

Summons a totem at your feet for 10 sec, which pulses every 1.9 sec, healing all party or raid members within 52 yards for 197581.7.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.

Casting Riptide grants 2 stacks of Tidal Waves. Tidal Waves reduces the cast time of your next Healing Wave or Chain Heal by 20%, or increases the critical effect chance of your next Healing Surge by 30%.
Your direct heal criticals refund a percentage of your maximum mana: 0.80% from Healing Wave, 0.48% from Healing Surge or Riptide, and 0.20% from Chain Heal.
Consuming Tidal Waves has a chance to reduce the cooldown of your Healing Stream, Cloudburst, Healing Tide, Mana Tide, and Poison Cleansing totems by 3.0 sec.
Your critical heals have 215% effectiveness instead of the usual 200%.

Summons a totem at the target location for 6 sec, which reduces damage taken by all party and raid members within 13 yards by 15%. Immediately and every 1 sec, the health of all affected players is redistributed evenly.

Casting Lava Burst increases the healing of your next Healing Surge by 30%, stacking up to 2 times.

Healing Surge applies Flame Shock to a nearby enemy when empowered by Master of the Elements.
Healing Stream Totem heals for 100% more, decaying over its duration.
Riptide's initial heal is increased 20% and has a 10% increased critical strike chance.
Reduces the cooldown of Healing Tide Totem by 45 sec.
Spirit Link Totem reduces damage taken by an additional 5%, and it restores 899,677 health to all nearby allies 1 second after it is dropped. Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
Chain Heal bounces an additional time and its healing is increased by 8%.
Every third Healing Wave or Healing Surge heals for an additional 50%.
Riptide and Lava Burst have an additional charge.
Summons a totem at the target location with 6.9 million health for 18 sec. 31,041 damage from each attack against allies within 11.5 yards of the totem is redirected to the totem.

Imbue your weapon with the element of Earth for 1 hour. Your Riptide, Healing Wave, Healing Surge, and Chain Heal healing a 20% chance to trigger Earthliving on the target, healing for 211,307 over 9 sec.

Transform into a Water Ascendant, duplicating all healing you deal at 70% effectiveness for 15 sec and immediately healing for 990,140. Ascendant healing is distributed evenly among allies within 40 yds.
Every 10 sec, the cast time of your next Chain Heal is reduced by 50%, and jump distance increased by 100%. Maximum of 2 charges.
Earth Shield reduces damage taken by 3% and its healing is increased by up to 150% as its target's health decreases. Maximum benefit is reached below 50% health.
The cooldown of Ascendance is reduced by 60 sec.
Chain Heal's mana cost is reduced by 10% and Chain Heal increases the initial healing of your next Riptide by 75%, stacking up to 2 times.
Earth Shield and Water Shield no longer lose charges and are 115% effective.

Casting Surging Totem has a 100% chance to activate Downpour, allowing you to cast Downpour within 22 sec.

 Downpour
A burst of water at your Surging Totem's location heals up to 5 injured allies within 12 yards for 503,258 and increases their maximum health by 10% for 6 sec.
Every 1 million mana you spend brings a High Tide, making your next 2 Chain Heals heal for an additional 10% and not reduce with each jump.

Casting Riptide has a 7% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.

 Ascendance
Transform into a Water Ascendant, duplicating all healing you deal at 70% effectiveness for 15 sec and immediately healing for 1 million. Ascendant healing is distributed evenly among allies within 40 yds.

Chain Heal now jumps to a nearby totem within 26 yards once it reaches its last target, causing the totem to cast Chain Heal on an injured ally within 34 yards for 213,903. Jumps to 2 nearby targets within 26 yards.
While Surging Totem is active, your damage and healing done is increased by 3%.
When you summon a Healing Tide Totem, Healing Stream Totem, Cloudburst Totem, Mana Tide Totem, or Spirit Link Totem you cast a free instant Chain Heal at 100% effectiveness.
Increases the size and radius of your totems by 15%, and the health of your totems by 30%.
If you have a totem active, your totem grants you a shield absorbing 531,230 damage for 30 sec every 30 sec.

Your Healing Stream Totems now also heals a second ally at 50% effectiveness. 

Cloudburst Totem stores 25% additional healing.
Increases the duration of your Earthliving effect by 3 sec.
Increases the healing done by Surging Totem by 25%.
Chain Heals from Lively Totem and Totemic Rebound are 25% more effective.

Elemental motes orbit around your Surging Totem. Your abilities consume the motes for enhanced effects. 

Water: Your next Healing Wave or Healing Surge also heals an ally inside of your Healing Rain at 100% effectiveness.

Air: The cast time of your next healing spell is reduced by 40%.

Earth: Your next Chain Heal applies Earthliving at 150% effectiveness to all targets hit.
